ygData.subject: Re: Chains + Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I laughed a long time after reading this.  Great humor =) Thanks Aloro =P Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody. League of Antonican Bards, The Wind
ygData.messageBody:
>Harmonic, that reminds me. Your mother asked me to make
>sure you weren't eating that summoned black bread - that
>stuff will rot your teeth. Do you still have that Shawl
>of the Wind Spirit? Forecasts for today are cold and wet,
>so do bundle up. Please try to get one helping of foraged
>veggies a day, and remember what she always told you: "A
>Hymn a day keeps the clerics away."

I laughed a long time after reading this. Great humor =)
Thanks Aloro =P

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
